channel.title: :100: Auxy Ideas (For if you are bored)
channel.description:
I was looking for fun things to do in Auxy. So I decided to spend 2 hours of my life creating this: ![Auxy%20Prompts%20(2)|353x500](upload://hw76F431qlsbeQS1ucfisKP0OYk.jpg) I created this to inspire myself, and the community of Auxians, to create. It's _extremely_ hard to read this on the disco, it was made to be printed out, but because I'm looking to waste more of my time here is the list written out: 1. Create a song with chords that only use sharp notes. 2. Create a song on 300BPM. 3. Create a song on 60BPM. 4. Create a song entirely made of samples. 5. Create a song using only original sounds. 6. Create a song only using only sounds from the 7 skies selection pack. 7. Create a song only using only sounds from the signature pianos pack. 8. Create a song only using only sounds from the sound of vivrant pack. 9. Create a song only using only sounds from the RAC essentials pack. 10. Create a song only using only sounds from the vintage keys pack. 11. Create a song only using only sounds from the future pack. 12. Create a song only using only sounds from the melodic percussion pack. 13. Create a song only using only sounds from the boom bass pack (sorry!). 14. Create a song only using only sounds from the destiny pack. 15. Create a song only using only sounds from the acoustic guitars pack. 16. Create a song only using only sounds from the orchestral strings pack. 17. Create a song only using only sounds from the sweet pads pack. 18. Create a song only using only sounds from the disturbing leads pack. 19. Create a song only using only sounds from the game waves pack. 20. Create a song that uses only three different instruments. 21. Create a song that uses only drums. 22. Create a song that uses only 5 different instruments. 23. Create a song with 10 swing. 24. Create a song with the wackiest chords you can make. 25. Create a song with no drums. 26. Create a song with the name 'Hiding From The Dark' and try to influence the song with that name. 27. Create a song without listening to it. 28. Create a song with no chords. 29. Create the weirdest song ever. 30. Create the best future bass you can. 31. Create a super heavy drop. 32. Create some insane dubstep. 33. Create a deep house song. 34. Create the most chill song you can make. 35. Create a song with lots and lots of percussion. 36. Create a song which uses one sound from each sound pack. 37. Create an emotional song. 38. Create a song based off a ringtone. 39. Create a remix of someone's song (ask them first). 40. Create a song only using notes C, D#, E, F, G#, B. 41. Create a very happy song. 42. Create a sad song. 43. Create a spooky song. 44. Create a song with 32 bar scenes, but as many as you like. 45. Create a song with only 1 bar scenes, but as many as you like. 46. Create a song with no automation. 47. Create a song which reminds you of cacti. 48. Create a song that uses clips of samples from random Youtube videos. 49. Create a song with samples of you singing, talking, rapping or making any kind of noise. 50. Create a song that has to make someone laugh. 51. Create a song in 10 minutes. 52. Create a song only using instruments beginning with vowels. 53. Create the best dubstep sounds (from auxy sounds) to use in other songs. 54. Create a song only using instruments with vocals in them. 55. Create a song all in the lowest octave. 56. Create a song all in the highest octave. 57. Create a song with two drum kits and four instruments only. 58. Create a song based off the default project name Auxy gives you. 59. Create a song with a random word or sentence generator as a songwriting prompt. 60. Create a song using a Youtube tutorial. 61. Create a remake of a popular song (not made in Auxy) in Auxy. 62. Create chords using Andrew Haung's candy chord making system. 63. Create a song only using basses. 64. Create a song at least 5 minutes long. 65. Create a song only using instruments that begin with F. 66. Create an evil song. 67. Create a trap song. 68. Create a DnB song. 69. Create a song that reminds you of cows. 70. Create a jazz song. 71. Create a catchy melody. 72. Create an upbeat song. 73. Create EDM. 74. Create a summer song. 75. Create a triplet only song. 76. Create a song that feels wet. 77. Create a song that feels dry. 78. Create a remix of one of your older songs. 79. Create an entry to a competition on the Auxy Disco. 80. Create a song that reminds you of your childhood (or your younger years). 81. Create a song based of a sample of your favourite animal Try to make the song about that animal (and use the sample). 82. Create a song that makes you happy. There are no other guidelines, it just has to make you happy. 83. Create a safari African themed song. 84. Create an Arabian sounding drop. 85. Create a song inspired by a family member of friend and name the track after them. 86. Create a song only using instruments with a Y in them. 87. Create a song that uses instruments that don't have A, U, X or Y in them. 88. Create a song that represents the country you are reading this in. 89. Create a song where each instrument is in it's raw state, no tone, shape or anything edited, and no automation. 90. Create the noise of an alarm clock. 91. Create the noise of a laser. 92. Create the noise of a truck backing up. 93. Create what OOF would sound like if it was an instrument. 94. Create a song using only the instruments: gossip, bumble, shade, crater, ocean, autumn, bee and blob. *Laughs evilly* 95. Create a fast paced DnB beat. 96. Create a simple but impactful beat for a drop that you could dance to. 97. Create a song to make someone smile. 98. Create a catchy chorus. 99. Create an intense buildup. 100. Create a song. Just go wild and do it.
So how it works it that if you are bored, write the numbers 1 - 100 on paper, cut them out and pick one randomly (or in the more modern age, use an online random number picker) and then create whatever the list tells you to create.
I know some are very similar but it was hard coming up with 100 ideas.
I'm very sorry for making the image version have a title that sounds like it came from a cheesy kids' TV show.
**Feel free to post links to any tracks you have created using this list as inspiration.**
Ask me any questions you have about it.
Enjoy! :grin:
